SEARCH
Module com.starbucksproject.starbucksposproject
Package com.starbucksproject.starbucksposproject

Class CurrentOrderList

java.lang.Object
com.starbucksproject.starbucksposproject.CurrentOrderList
public class CurrentOrderList extends Object
Static class that holds the current order list for quick loading and saving when swapping menus.

    • completeTransaction

      public void completeTransaction()
      The function takes all the orders within the CurrentOrder Array, and updates them to the transaction table listed within the SQL. Process: Gets the date of the transaction, gets the employee name, gets the total price of every item, submits the query.

    • isManager

      public boolean isManager()
      Returns:
      A boolean of whether the current employee is a manager or not.

    • setManager

      public void setManager(boolean manager)
      The function sets the manager status of CurrentEmployee.

    • getIdToNameMap

      public HashMap<Integer,String> getIdToNameMap() throws SQLException
      Returns:
      Returns HashMap containing pairs between menu item ids and menu item names (not display names since they don't distinguish sizes)
      Throws:
      SQLException
